website_summaries.verdict: This interactive Osmo set with 3 creative apps will encourage young visual artists to sketch, draw and animate. Parents will need to invest in the original Osmo game base, however.
pros: Very educational, spurs creativity from younger children
Monster character is appealing to a wide audience
cons: App only works with Apple devices
Additional supplies can be obtained elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Not needed to use the app. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: What they don't tell you is you can use the app without this set. You are paying an outrageous price for a wipe-off board, markers and pencil case.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmadhatter

customer_reviews.title: Use your own supplies
customer_reviews.text: Very cute app but we didn't need the osmo monster kit to use the program. We already had the starter kit so we used our own white board, eraser and dry erase makers.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: OSMO is awesome.e!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Very interactive!! My children, nieces, step children in house, alllll love it. I love OSMO and plan to buy alll products when I can.
customer_reviews.author: LEILANI

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Description of what is in the package not clear. This is actually just a cheaply made plastic white board and cheaply made pens!
customer_reviews.author: Reefer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but horrible white board!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old for Christmas. She loves it but the white board doesn’t clean well - It stains which frustrates her. I’ve tried using other markers and cleaners but no luck. I also tried cleaning it with Mr. Clean Magic Eraser, but even that didn’t do it. It still has some stains and marks left on the board. She has been using printer paper instead until I found a generic white board. Such a shame to have a beautiful Osmo white board and not be able to use it. . .
customer_reviews.author: TravelingCat

customer_reviews.title: Both my 4 and 8-year-old boys love this game
customer_reviews.text: As a software developer, I am always looking for new and creative ways to teach my children. Both my 4 and 8-year-old boys love this game, and they enjoy seeing their creations come to life in a story. Your developers and UX designers did a fantastic job!:)
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: We love Osmo! This is just an add on
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product. We love Osmo! This is just an add on..... there is no base included. I wanted to get the 'official' white board. Tangram is our favorite. My son has been doing that since he was 2 and he is 4 now and it is still interesting to him. Number and Words he sees and plays a little when older cousins come to visit but he is only 4! I purchased the Coding Jam for his upcoming 5th birthday just because he loves making music. I think all of these will hold creative and learning value as he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Janay Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Can not love this more!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this as a gift for Christmas this year and haven't stopped playing with it since! I love the fact that their exact drawing and creation that they put on the whiteboard goes into their kindle for Ozmo to play with! it is amazing! I absolutely hate that electronics seem to be taking over the younger generation- but this is an awesome learning and imagination toy for sure!!! My son is 10 and my daughter is 6 and they both love it! even my 17 year old played with it!
customer_reviews.author: Breigh

customer_reviews.title: Love Osmo
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos have loved playing with this. Osmo talks and interacts with you while giving instructions on what to do next. We purchased the drawing board even though some suggested you could use pretty much any kind of white board. The board fits perfectly against the iPad. The orange marker doesn’t wipe off very well but the others a great. The blue fluffy bag is great for wiping off the board also. We have purchased all the osmo pieces and it’s educational and fun at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: B_stein8

customer_reviews.title: Please read!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the osmo base then you don’t need to buy this. It’s simply a dry erase board with markers. You can download the app and use a regular dry erase board and markers and be just fine. There isn’t anything that makes it a must with your iPad. We do like it, but it’s not needed to use the awesome app with your osmo.
customer_reviews.author: HookedOnBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Osmo set! The dry erase board is a nice size & I love how well it was put together. However, the ink tends to stain, even when wiped off shortly after. I've tried different cleaning suggestions I found online, but to no avail. I hope they update the finish they use so other buyers don't have the same issue. Great app & great, entertaining & educational accessories!!
customer_reviews.author: bezsenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We love it. My daughter just turned 7. The monster is super cute! Yes it’s a wipe board with markers and a cute bag but she uses her wipe board to play “pizza” game on to on our rug. And it’s high quality! Its hard to find a press ant for her at this age that helps with her drawing and following directions all on her own. It’s adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Riley

customer_reviews.title: Priceless smiles
customer_reviews.text: We received the Osmos set as a gift for my 4 year old. She used it a few times. I saw the creative set and thought why not give it a try? My daughter LOVES it!! The fact that her drawings are used to create an adventure is just amazing to her! Her whole face lights up when she sits there and concentrates in drawing the best that she can and then it comes “alive”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guy

customer_reviews.title: but the white board work great for sitting right up next to the base without ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not really necessary if you already have the osmo gaming system, but the white board work great for sitting right up next to the base without causing an annoying line on the screen. The markers are ok. The orange marker doesn't erase easily and while trying to get it to work in the beginning sprayed orange ink everywhere. The brown marker doesn't work that great either. I think regular dry erase markers would be better, just because they are less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Osmo Creative Pad
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Osmo Genius kit for my kids, the really wanted the creative pad to go with it. Purchased a “used” osmo pad from Amazon. Description stated minor scratches but with original Packaging. Order arrived and in amazing condition! Box was taped shut that was the only difference between new and used. Very happy with my purchase and able to save a bunch of money! The kids love it and it keeps them busy doing activities other than YouTube or Movies on their tablets! Highly recommend the Osmo system for children!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great product but games get boring quick
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like to color but he loves this program. I just wish that it had more of a variety of programming. After the second time, it’s all pretty predictable. The story line is exactly the same. I wish they produced new content for the same accessories
customer_reviews.author: TM Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This game/toy is so fun! It is interactive and educational! My girls of various elementary school ages all enjoy it. The technology is fascinating and keeps the kids entertained longer than I should let it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just but it from another place
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product BUT, i recommend buying it from another seller. I only noticed that the base and reflector are not included in the box after i got the shipment, and basically you cant use it whithout the base and reflector. I have to go and buy those separate now. Other sellers sell the complete set for almost the same price
customer_reviews.author: Omar Alzaid

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the monster!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my daughter's favorite addition to her Osmo set. She loves interacting with the monster and drawing for him. She also enjoys the fact that he keeps a gallery of everything she's done for him. The tablet and markers work well. Easy to store. Love that the pouch has a magnet in it to keep it with all the other Osmo gear.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: drawing set - interactive
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my grandson. This is a great drawing kit to add to the Osmo. He loves to use his dad's ipad so this is the best teaching tool to use it on. He loves the good monster drawing.
customer_reviews.author: shirleylove

customer_reviews.title: We Love Mo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we purchased this! It has instantly become a family favorite. Even my graphic designer husband likes to play with Mo from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Winston a.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old and 6-year-old love this. It is there favorite part of Osmo. It's adorable and keeps them entertained, perfect for any child who loves to draw. My kids love seeing their drawings interacting with the Monster.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: LOV IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter love this! I love how the maker bag has magnets so it can stay on the drawing pad. I also love the fact that the marker bag is also the eraser. This game is pretty cool that I even enjoy playing with it with my daughter. If you have this game system I would definitely recommend it for your child.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: While I liked most of the games
customer_reviews.text: We have had the OSMO system since it came out. While I liked most of the games, they never kept my kids' (daughters 7 and 6) attention for very long. However, the Monster game is different. They are always asking to play it and do so for quite a while. Further, I am perfectly content to let them hone their drawing skills for as long as they want. Good work OSMO!
customer_reviews.author: Lucil Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids, 5 & 7yrs, LOVE this! They will play with this as long as we'll let them. Highly recommend!! Easy to set up, super interactive and fun for kids and even adults, and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Mo is great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with "Mo" and having him take her drawings on adventures. Some of the pens that come with it stained the board and was hard to wipe off with the pouch. The pouch it comes with is convenient but doesn't always wipe well. I find that baby wipes work better. 2 pens are already dried out but I think that's because of the brand Yoobi. We only had it for 3 days before the pens began to run out, however, any dry erase pens would work with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gets bored, but 5 year old likes it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this set works. No problems recognizing and putting drawings on screen. 3 year old doesn't last too long, gets bored, but 5 year old likes it. It's hard to keep them sitting still for very long. I think they will eventually spend more time on game.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Best IPad game for 5-10 yr old kids.
customer_reviews.text: Best IPad game for 5-10 yr old kids. I recomend it very strongly, you should buy the complete package. Some times is hard to clean the board.
customer_reviews.author: CAMILO

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Osmo base is not included
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 stars if the Osmo base was included in this set. I wouldn’t mind paying higher price if Osmo decided to charge higher price. Both my boy and I are extremely disappointed when we realised it after unboxing. Thumb down to Osmo
customer_reviews.author: ng m.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kit !!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is fantastic. So many possibilities of drawing or playing in an interactive fashion with the iPad. App is great as well. You need to buy the Osmo base to use this. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fruchstuck

customer_reviews.title: Osmo has done it again.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea for children who like to be creative. My grandchildren love following the suggestions that Mo gives them and trying to create their own designs.
customer_reviews.author: Samprn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest interactive learning game. The digital rendering of the drawings made by the child on the dry-erase board are amazing. My 5-year old would spend hours playing with this if we let her.
customer_reviews.author: dappers

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant addition to Osmo - get if your child loves to draw
customer_reviews.text: I have the entire Osmo set but resisted buying this one for a long time as it's the replacement for a white board or lots of papers! Seemed a waste of a lot of money... However the quality of the unit is really amazing - whiteboard is really big and matches well with the Osmo set. The attached markers are simply way better than anything we had seen. They are not smelly and the market tip is hard but smooth simultaneously. In fact, post using the markers, we also ordered quite a lot of markers from Yoobi. My daughter loves this and it's quickly become her favorite activity using Osmo.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Habib

customer_reviews.title: It is the best thing We have seen in a long time
customer_reviews.text: We just bought osmo creative set along with all the other sets for my 4 year old. We are so impressed with these games. It is the best thing We have seen in a long time. My son loves it and so do we!! recommending it to anyone with kids ages 4 and up. Some of the games are a little challenging for him still but he will definitely grow with it.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used this to make iPad time more educational. The kids love it and have learned a lot from it. I highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic educational toy!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly. This s probably one of the coolest educational toys we have. Watching my child play on the iPad and learn to follow directions and draw is pretty incredible. I also love how much it helps her to learn to be creative on her own! It is encouraging and totally worth the money. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AudreyBlake_

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning time for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter again loves this product. She is in ahhh with it. She is playing with it every night. I have to pull her away at bed time. hahaha She loves it. I also bought one for my niece but I haven't been able to give it to her yet.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Johnston

customer_reviews.title: As an adult, be available to help.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for grandchildren. Gave the game to two families and it was a big hit. Creativity was an obvious outcome but it satisfies a small aspect of the creative possibilities. It’s a useful tool in that it makes suggestions but is limiting because it gives examples that the children simply try to copy thereby shortening the thought process. I haven’t seen the children’s art after using Osmo and independent of the game as I live quite far from them.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creative drawing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this. She loved how the character interacts with her drawing. It suggests what to draw with an image to draw from. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Have to have the game system too
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the description clear enough. You have to buy the game system as well. This is a white board, markers and a carrying case. Couldn't find the game system on amazon but i did find it for $20 on the Osmo website.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... is very interactive with my 6 yo which is great. We just took item out of box though ...
customer_reviews.text: So far product seems to be working well and the monster is very interactive with my 6 yo which is great. We just took item out of box though and unfortunately already one of the markers is dead. :( Maybe there is a way to fix it seller??? Thx
customer_reviews.author: Health Minded

customer_reviews.title: Neat!!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays this for hours- he loves it!! Great for imagination and creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Wiscount

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for Osmo owners. My 6 year old loves seeing his drawings come to life.
customer_reviews.author: Thorjax

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game. If you already own the Osmo, this is a great addition to the set. So much fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: tdpatter

customer_reviews.title: Another great game by Osmo!
customer_reviews.text: This was another great addition to my grandson’s OSMO game. My five year old grandson loves “everything” Osmo! Thanks Osmo for helping in developing and challenging young minds.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMo

customer_reviews.title: Best gift purchase ever!👍
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. Item was purchased for my grandchildren and they love it. They don’t even realize they are leaning while playing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Osmo, but it takes a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Osmo, but it takes a bit of figuring out with the iPad and I was hoping it would have more educational component to the drawing, maybe it does and we just haven't figured it out yet!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Renee @UsJohnsons

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing and is a big hit with our 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing and is a big hit with our 8 year old. Incredible how he grabs the drawings right off the board! Wows the kids and adults every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Jo
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. Shipping fast and without problem
customer_reviews.author: Kopaniecki Jan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Our 7-year-old daughter and 5-year-old niece loved playing with this Monster Game over the holiday season. It provided hours of interactive entertainment. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adult kids too!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and creative! Just a hint.. if you draw something funny (not what they ask you to draw), sometimes you can get some hilarious interractions.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: SO amazing and engaging in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: SO amazing and engaging in my classroom!!!!!! Great for facilitating language. The base for the iPad came in the 'genius set', not 'creative'.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: There is a base required in order to play and it is not included so I had to order a starter kit and my daughter is waiting for
customer_reviews.text: Beware! There is a base required in order to play and it is not included so I had to order a starter kit and my daughter is waiting for that to come to enjoy the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Isom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great addition to all the other apps and games. Creative kids minds can truly expand with all Osmo products
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goeller

customer_reviews.title: Must have for childrens Ipad
customer_reviews.text: I have other OSMO sets and this is by far my 8 y/o favorite
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old hasn't put this game down since Christmas! He loves the interaction with the monster and loves seeing his art come to life!
customer_reviews.author: jquon58

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! So much fun that even my mother was rushing over to see how my son's drawings were used in the program. I'm thoroughly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my 7 year old daughter for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 7 year old daughter for Christmas and she can't put it down. Just make sure you have the base set which is not included with this game.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Very neat!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so cool!!!!! She played this for a long time and had a blast. She has been wanting this one for a while and was super excited to finally get to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The board is made to fit around the osmo base, and it flips to be the perfect surface for tanagram, words, numbers, etc. I can't say enough good things about this set!
customer_reviews.author: hopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old for Chirstmas this year and she LOVES it! The only downfall as with all Osmo products is that the iPad cannot have a case on it when using it...just kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds their attention
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Osmo! This is one Christmas gift that has not been forgotten.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good educational product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandkids to go with their other Osmo sets. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Great for inspiring creativity in young minds
customer_reviews.text: Great for inspiring creativity in young minds. The unrestrained giggle from my nephew makes the purchase totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy07302

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves his gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my nephew and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Love osmo!
customer_reviews.text: We love osmo products. This one is my 9 year old’s favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but you have the Base.
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nice and interest product, but BE AWARE it' s an accessory!!, you need to buy or to have the base and the camera (sold separately).
customer_reviews.author: George!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandson, as he already likes art. He absolutely loves it! He is 9 years old Him and his 7 year old brother play it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Roe

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the Osmo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. It's one of cooler add ons for the Oslo. He's really enjoyed drawing and a perk is that the marker case also acts as an eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Dollskin16

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC. We own all the Osmo products and this one is a favorite with my younger and older children. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the base. iPad use but not video games actually educational
customer_reviews.author: Scozz091323

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend for 1 and 2nd graders
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yrs. Old Daughter Loves this along with the Pizza game . 100% would recommend for 1 and 2nd graders !
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! Keeps your little ones entertained in their creativity. The only thing I don't like is that the orange marker is hard to clean from the board, but overall I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a stand-alone product
customer_reviews.text: Beware! We were disappointed in that it wasn't clear that you must have the Osmo starter kit in order to use this. The video makes it look like it's all inclusive - so you have to spend a lot first in order to buy this product to use. Misleading. Did not get to use it yet as we do not have the starter kit. Not sure if we will purchase it yet...
customer_reviews.author: dr. mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for kids.. my 4yr old daughter loves it.. we use it a lot for long travels.. I jst wish it wud come with a case so travelling with it cud hv been easier..
customer_reviews.author: Juhi Chowdhary

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: VERY cool and an absolute hit with my kids! Definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: KSmith

customer_reviews.title: The markers came dried out. Is it really $50 ...
customer_reviews.text: The markers were completely dried out when we opened the package. Is it really $50 for the whiteboard, an eraser, and 6 markers?? The game is not included, it appears. OH MY GOSH, I can't even return it! ugh
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is his favorite add on so far
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his osmo. This is his favorite add on so far. Super sleek technology and fun for my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Bash_Bash

customer_reviews.title: Whiteboard is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set! I did a separate whiteboard etc; after reading several reviews, but I ordered the creative set recently when it was priced lower and it’s just such good quality and a nice size. To me it was worth it compared to some of the cheap, crappy whiteboards out there.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Stadler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My child just loves it and spends hours on it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: What a great overall experience!
customer_reviews.text: What a great overall experience. The monster charector is engaging and the image capture works great. I will caution two things: 1- make sure you have good lighting as this can affect what it sees as an image, 2- if you get some funny images make sure you didn’t bump the red reflector mirror on your I pad. Easy for kids to knock out of position if touching the screen to excitedly.
customer_reviews.author: skylar

customer_reviews.title: My LO loves it. But the games are repetitive ...
customer_reviews.text: My LO loves it. But the games are repetitive so she lost interest quickly. Needs more variety.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: creative and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old played with this for hours. Educational, creative and FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Rabideau

customer_reviews.title: Creative
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift but my granddaughter loves it. It's interactive so she is not just watching, but doing. I love that.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory to Osmo. Kids love to interact and create things with Mo. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it quick kids are enjoying this and me too!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids ages 7 and 3 love Mo and to play and create over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Brough

customer_reviews.title: Improved screen time!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this set and some other osmo games for Christmas this year. She just turned 4 and I think there is enough here for her to enjoy and keep learning for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I taught I'm buying with a good price but the same one with the base is for 34.99. I'm very disappointed especially if I want to return I have to pay 9$ shipping back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Monika Czapla

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but I think the price is too high for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very cool as it inspires such creativity
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES it!!! Very cool as it inspires such creativity!
customer_reviews.author: judi k.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy. Not sure who loves it more
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toy. Not sure who loves it more, my wife or my daughter. The monster is a lot of fun and the drawing helps to balance out the other products to help build a full educational set for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice concept, but fell a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Brought such creativity and joy!
customer_reviews.text: My nephews are thrilled with this! Brought such creativity and joy!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Barszcz

customer_reviews.title: An Entertaining Learning Tool
customer_reviews.text: My four-year old granddaughter is delighted with Osmo. She is intrigued and entertained by the Monster in the creative set. This is not a toy it's a developmental system that will grow with her
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: ... a used one that it matters but markers are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Markers dry out quickly- not sure if we got a used one that it matters but markers are terrible

customer_reviews.title: Not only did we love giving this as a Christmas present for my granddaughter

product_meta.title: Osmo - Creative Set - New Version Available (Discontinued By Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Osmo learning games makes it fun for children to learn, using toys as teaching tools. Osmo is magic. In 2013, Osmo created a fun-filled & Award winning learning games that interact with actual hand held pieces & an iPad and/or fire tablet, bringing a child's game pieces & actions to life (no Wi-Fi necessary for game play). Osmo merges tactile exploration with innovative technology, actively engaging children in the learning process. Osmo games develop a wide range of skills, varying skills based on each game, including: creativity, problem-solving, confidence gaining, child-led, hands-on, gender-neutral, curriculum Inclusion, social/emotional skills, STEM/steam (science, technology, engineering Math & art) and many more educational capabilities. Games are designed for children between the ages of 3-11+ and include beginner to expert levels. Osmo enables the continuation of learning. Creative set focuses on the following game play: travel on an adventure & solve story problems with personal drawings brought to life instantly on the iPad (monster) along with drawing problem solving/early physics (Newton), creative drawing skills (masterpiece). approved by parents and teachers worldwide, used in over 31, 000 classrooms. Tag your photos on social media with #osmonaut to be featured.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: TEACHING: Travel on an adventure & solve story problems with personal drawings brought to life instantly on an iPad or Fire Tablet, available in Spanish and English (Monster), solve creative physics puzzles by drawing lines or placing items in front of the screen (Newton) & learn to draw anything with creative drawing skills (Masterpiece).

SKILLS LEARNED: Drawing, listening, speed of drawing, visual thinking, problem solving, physics, creative problem solving & fine motor skills. Osmo sees and reacts to every real-life move. Geared towards children & love of learning.

AGE & CAPABILITY: Ages 5-10+. Games are designed for beginner to expert levels. Osmo enables the continuation of learning. Real-time audio and visual feedback lets children learn through experimentation in a stress-free environment.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Creative Board, 4 erasable markers, Fuzzy eraser pouch, Stackable storage for each game, & 3 Game Apps: Monster, Newton, and Masterpiece.

COMPATIBILITY FOR IPAD & FIRE TABLET: Compatible iPads: All iPads except Generation 1, iPad Pro 11-inch and iPad Pro 12.9-inch. The minimum iOS version needed is iOS 9. Compatible Fire Tablets: 7th Generation Fire 7, 7th Generation Fire HD 8, 7th Generation Fire HD10, 8th Generation Fire HD 8, 9th Generation Fire 7, 9th Generation Fire HD 10. Currently not compatible with the new Fire HD8 launched May 2020.

OSMO IS MAGIC: Fun-filled & award winning learning games. Children interact with actual hand held pieces & an iPad or Fire Tablet, bringing a child's game pieces & actions to life (No WiFi necessary for game play). Osmo Base and iPad/Fire Tablet not included, required for game play.
